languages.text: "Не знаю, как вы, а я {rt_mf|ему|ей} на глаза попадаться не собираюсь. А то и самому можно без глаз остаться. Я слышал, и такое было. Мой господин когда меня плетями бьет, то хоть за дело. И руки-ноги целы. Ох, Император, защити..."
languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера: если превалирует жесткосердность
Костляый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: "Не знаю, как вы, а я {mf|ему|ей} на глаза попадаться не собираюсь. А то и самому можно без глаз остаться. Я слышал, и такое было. Мой господин когда меня плетями бьет, то хоть за дело. И руки-ноги целы. Ох, Император, защити..."

languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера: если превалирует жесткосердность
Костляый простолюдин

languages.text: "Don't know about you, but I'd rather not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, I might lose my own! It happens! Now my lord, when he has me whipped, at least it's for something I did — and I've still got all my limbs. Oh, Emperor protect us..."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю, как вы, а я {rt_mf|ему|ей} на глаза попадаться не собираюсь. А то и самому можно без глаз остаться. Я слышал, и такое было. Мой господин когда меня плетями бьет, то хоть за дело. И руки-ноги целы. Ох, Император, защити..."

traits.locale_text: "Don't know about you but I'll do what I can to not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, it may cost me my own eyes. I've heard of that kind of thing happening. When my lord has me whipped, it's for something I did. And all my limbs are still in place. Ah, Emperor protect me..."

"Don't know about you but I'll do what I can to not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, it may cost me my own eyes. I've heard of that kind of thing happening. When my lord has me whipped, it's for something I did. And all my limbs are still in place. Ah, Emperor protect me..."

"Don't know about you, but I'll do what I can to not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, it may cost me my own. I've heard of that kind of thing happening. When my lord has me whipped, it's for something I did. And all my limbs are still in place. Ah, Emperor protect me..."

"Don't know about you, but I'll do what I can to not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, it may cost me my own. I've heard of that kind of thing happening. When my lord has me whipped, it's for something I did. And all my limbs are still in place. Ah, Emperor protect me..."

"Don't know about you, but I'd rather not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, I might lose my own! It happens! Now my lord, when he has me whipped, at least it's for something I did — and I've still got all my limbs. Oh, Emperor protect us..."

"Don't know about you, but I'd rather not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, I might lose my own! It happens! Now my lord, when he has me whipped, at least it's for something I did — and I've still got all my limbs. Oh, Emperor protect us..."

languages.text: “我不知道你们都怎么想，但我可不想被{rt_mf|他|她}盯上，否则{rt_mf|他|她}可能会把我眼睛挖出来！这种事情不是没有可能！想想咱们的总督大人吧，至少他用鞭子抽我的时候，确实是因为我犯了错，而且我的胳膊腿还在。天啊，愿帝皇保佑我们……”
languages.original_text: "Don't know about you, but I'd rather not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, I might lose my own! It happens! Now my lord, when he has me whipped, at least it's for something I did — and I've still got all my limbs. Oh, Emperor protect us..."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道你们都怎么想，但我可不想被{rt_mf|他|她}盯上，否则{rt_mf|他|她}可能会把我眼睛挖出来！这种事情不是没有可能！想想咱们的总督大人吧，至少他用鞭子抽我的时候，确实是因为我犯了错，而且我的胳膊腿还在。天啊，愿帝皇保佑我们……”

languages.text: «No sé vosotros, pero preferiría no captar su atención. ¡Me arriesgaría a perder un ojo! ¡A veces pasa! Por lo menos cuando mi señor me hace flagelar es por algo que he hecho, y todavía tengo todas las extremidades. Que el Emperador nos proteja...».
languages.original_text: "Don't know about you, but I'd rather not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, I might lose my own! It happens! Now my lord, when he has me whipped, at least it's for something I did — and I've still got all my limbs. Oh, Emperor protect us..."

traits.locale_text: «No sé vosotros, pero preferiría no captar su atención. ¡Me arriesgaría a perder un ojo! ¡A veces pasa! Por lo menos cuando mi señor me hace flagelar es por algo que he hecho, y todavía tengo todas las extremidades. Que el Emperador nos proteja...».

languages.text: "Seni bilmem ama ben onun gözüne ilişmemeyi tercih ederim. İlişirsem kendi gözümden olabilirim! Oluyor böyle şeyler! Şimdi benim efendim beni kırbaçlattığında en azından yaptığım bir şey için oluyor. Üstelik tüm uzuvlarım hâlâ yerinde. İmparator bizi korusun..."
languages.original_text: "Don't know about you, but I'd rather not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, I might lose my own! It happens! Now my lord, when he has me whipped, at least it's for something I did — and I've still got all my limbs. Oh, Emperor protect us..."

traits.locale_text: "Seni bilmem ama ben onun gözüne ilişmemeyi tercih ederim. İlişirsem kendi gözümden olabilirim! Oluyor böyle şeyler! Şimdi benim efendim beni kırbaçlattığında en azından yaptığım bir şey için oluyor. Üstelik tüm uzuvlarım hâlâ yerinde. İmparator bizi korusun..."

languages.text: 「お前はどうか知らないが、俺は{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の注目を引きたくないね。そんなことをしたら、命がないかもしれない！俺たちの主人は、少なくとも俺のしたことについて俺をむち打ったが、まだ手足は残っている。あぁ、陛下、俺たちを守り給え…」
languages.original_text: "Don't know about you, but I'd rather not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, I might lose my own! It happens! Now my lord, when he has me whipped, at least it's for something I did — and I've still got all my limbs. Oh, Emperor protect us..."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はどうか知らないが、俺は{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の注目を引きたくないね。そんなことをしたら、命がないかもしれない！俺たちの主人は、少なくとも俺のしたことについて俺をむち打ったが、まだ手足は残っている。あぁ、陛下、俺たちを守り給え…」

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas pour vous, mais je préfère ne pas croiser son regard. Je tiens à mes yeux, moi ! Je ne veux pas les perdre ! Quand mon seigneur me fouette, au moins, c'est parce que j'ai fait quelque chose que je n'aurais pas dû. Et j'ai encore tous mes membres. Oh, que l'Empereur nous protège... »
languages.original_text: "Don't know about you, but I'd rather not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, I might lose my own! It happens! Now my lord, when he has me whipped, at least it's for something I did — and I've still got all my limbs. Oh, Emperor protect us..."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas pour vous, mais je préfère ne pas croiser son regard. Je tiens à mes yeux, moi ! Je ne veux pas les perdre ! Quand mon seigneur me fouette, au moins, c'est parce que j'ai fait quelque chose que je n'aurais pas dû. Et j'ai encore tous mes membres. Oh, que l'Empereur nous protège... »

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, wie es Euch geht, aber ich will {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} lieber nicht ins Auge springen. Sonst verliere ich noch mein eigenes! Das kommt vor! Mein Herr, wenn der mich auspeitschen lässt, dann wenigstens, weil ich etwas angestellt habe. Und ich habe noch alle Gliedmaßen! Oh, der Imperator schütze uns ..."
languages.original_text: "Don't know about you, but I'd rather not catch {rt_mf|his|her} eye. If I do, I might lose my own! It happens! Now my lord, when he has me whipped, at least it's for something I did — and I've still got all my limbs. Oh, Emperor protect us..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, wie es Euch geht, aber ich will {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} lieber nicht ins Auge springen. Sonst verliere ich noch mein eigenes! Das kommt vor! Mein Herr, wenn der mich auspeitschen lässt, dann wenigstens, weil ich etwas angestellt habe. Und ich habe noch alle Gliedmaßen! Oh, der Imperator schütze uns ..."
